Toolbox Display the Toolbox menu.

Press Ctrl-T to toggle between the standard menu and the extended menu.

Open the Information Center screen

This figure is the amount of cash that your corporation currently has. Click here to view its #Balance Sheet#.
This figure is the amount of cash your corporation currently has.
This figure is your corporation's operating profit over the past 12 months. Click here to view its #Income Statement#.
This figure is your corporation's operating profit over the past 12 months.
The vertical bars represent your corporation's monthly profit or loss.
Vertical bars represent your corporation's monthly profit or loss.
This is the current game date.
This is the current game date

Build Menu (hotkey: B)

Headquarters

Stock Market
Game Speed (hotkey: '0' to pause, '1' to '5' to set speed)
Game Speed (hotkey: '1' to '5')
Click the speed dial to change the game speed. #Double-click# here to see tips for #improving game running speed#.
Click the speed dial to alter the game speed.
The default setting of #Internal Sale# is #Disabled#. Competitors are allowed to buy your products.
Click to disable Internal Sale and allow competitors to buy your products
The default setting of #Internal Sale# is #Enabled#. Competitors are not allowed to buy your products.
Click to enable Internal Sale and ban competitors from buying your products
The default setting of #AutoLink to Supplier# is #Disabled#.
Click to disable AutoLink to Supplier.
You must select suppliers manually.
You must select suppliers manually
The default setting of #AutoLink to Supplier# is #Enabled#.
Click to enable AutoLink to Supplier.
Your purchasing units will attempt to find suppliers automatically.
Your purchasing units will attempt to find a supplier
The default setting of #Auto Apply R&D Results# is #Disabled#.
Click to disable Auto Apply R&D Results.
The default setting of #Auto Apply R&D Results# is #Enabled#.
Click to enable Auto Apply R&D Results.
Hold #SHIFT# key while clicking for #10X# speed. Hold #CTRL# key while clicking for #100X# speed.
Hold SHIFT key while clicking for 10X speed.
Hold #SHIFT# key while clicking for #10X# speed. Hold #CTRL# key while clicking for #100X# speed.
Hold SHIFT key while clicking for 10X speed.
Open News Log window (hotkey: 'V')
Open News Log window (hotkey:'V')
Close News Log window (hotkey: 'V')
Close News Log window (hotkey:'V')
Click to allow purchasing units to find their own suppliers. #Double-click# to apply the change of this setting to #all your firms#.
Click to allow purchasing units to find their own suppliers
Set up a new production for this firm (hotkey: A)
Set up a new production for this firm.
A unit with a higher experience level has #larger capacity# and #higher productivity#.
The overall productivity and capacity of most units increase when their unit
A unit's level can be increased through #training#.
levels increase. Training will increase them increase their levels faster.
Capacity Utilization Rate
Capacity Utilization Rate of the Unit
A high utilization rate means that the unit is operating efficiently.
A high utilization rate means that your unit is operating efficiently.
A low rate means that the unit has idle time and its capacity is underutilized.
A low rate means that your unit has idle time and its capacity is not well utilized.
Hotkey: Press the first letter of the name of a functional unit to add it instantly.
Hotkey: Press the first letter of the name of an functional unit to add it instantly.
Gray colors mean imports from seaports.
Gray colors means imports from seaports.
When #Internal Sale# is enabled, competitors cannot purchase this product from you.
When Internal Sale is enabled, competitors cannot purchase this product from you.
If you want to enable #Internal Sale# by default, you can open the #Option menu# (hotkey: 'O') and set #Default Internal Sale# to #Enabled#.
If you want to enable Internal Sale by default, you can open the Option menu (hotkey: 'O') and set Default Internal Sale to Enabled.
View Clients View the list of clients that are purchasing this product.
Show Clients
Hotkey: Ctrl-M
Hotkey: F3
A city's population growth is supported by 1) #a low unemployment rate#, 2) #high quality of living#, and 3) #sufficient housing supply#.
A city's population growth is supported by 1) #a low employment rate#, 2) #high quality of living#, and 3) #sufficient housing supply#.
Generally, when there are a large number of job openings available in the city, the city can afford to accept immigrants at a faster pace.
Generally, when there is a large number of job openings available in the city, the city can afford to accept immigrants at a faster pace.
The unemployment rate decreases when the economy is growing, and companies are expanding and creating new jobs.
The unemployment rate trends lower when the GDP growth is healthy and private companies are expanding and creating new jobs.
A growing real wage rate means that people are earning more money, even after adjusting for inflation.
A growing real wage rate means that people are earning more money, even after being adjusted for inflation.
The inflation rate is primarily affected by the unemployment rate (people spend less when they are unemployed) and the money demand and supply (increased money supply promotes consumer spending).
The inflation rate is affected by the unemployment rate (people spend less when they are unemployed) and the money demand and supply (higher money supply promotes spending).
Consumer Price Index
Consumer Price Index (CPI)
This shows the cumulative change in the price level of consumer goods since the beginning of the game.
CPI tells the accmulated effects of inflation over years.
The base value is 100.
It starts with a base value of 100 and increases during inflation times and decreases during deflation times.
Wildcard layout plans are for factories and can be used for producing any products with the same number of inputs.
Wildcard layout plans are for factories only and can be used for producing any products with the same number of inputs.
Financial stocks
Only show companies whose main business activities are investing into other companies.
Only show financial companies, including companies whose main business activities are investing into other companies.
Operational Level Setting When this civic building is #not in full operation#, its #operating cost is lower#.
When this civic building is not in full operation, its operating cost is lower.
You are advised to set this based on the #Supply/Demand index# displayed at the lower part of this info window.
You are advised to set this based on the Supply/Demand index displayed at the lower part of this info window.
The low value of this aspect of quality of life has caused some people to emigrate from this city to other cities.
The low value of this aspect of quality of life has caused some people to emigrating from this city to other cities.
Click here to open the #Goal report#.
Click here to open the Goal report.
Confirm the price change (hotkey: ']')
Confirm the price change (hotkey: '*' or ']')
The current stock price.
Текущая цена акций.
The total number of shares currently held by all its shareholders.
Общее количество акций, которыми в настоящее время владеют все ее акционеры.
The market capitalization of a company.
Рыночная капитализация компании.
It equals to its share price times the total number of shares outstanding.
Она равна её цене акции, умноженной на общее количество акций в обращении.
In other words, it is the total market value of the company in the stock market.
Другими словами, это общая рыночная стоимость компании на фондовом рынке.
Earnings Per Share
Earning Per Share
The Earnings Per Share is a company's operating profit over the past 365 days divided by the total number of outstanding shares.
The Earning Per Share is a company's operating profit over the past 365 days divided by the total number of outstanding shares.
A high P/E ratio generally means the stock is expensive as people are buying high prices to buy the stock, possibly driven by investors' confidence in the company's growth prospect.
A high P/E ratio generally means the the stock is expensive as people are buying high prices to buy the stock, possibly driven by investors' confidence in the company's growth prospect.

If any of your other firms have #broken supply links# which require the #same item# that #this Sales unit# is selling, you may use this button to #redirect all the affected supply links# to #this Sales unit#.
If any of your other firms have broken supply links which requires the same item that this Sales unit is selling, you may use this button to redirect the supply link to the current Sales unit.
For example, your mine's reserve #has exhausted#, and you have just #built a new mine#, then you may use this button to #redirect all the affected supply links# to the #new mine#.
For instance, your mine's reserve has exhausted, and you have just built a new mine, then you may use this button to redirect supply links to the new mine.
To increase the limit, first increase the tech level of the product.
To increase the limit, first increase the tech level of the prodcut.
e.g. You have defined a custom image of Smart Phone with a tech level of 300.
e.g. You have defined a custom image of Smart Phone with a tech level of 300.
If this is enabled, any firms in your company and #subsidiaries# will always be able to buy products from each other, regardless of the #Internal Sale# setting.
If this is enabled, any firms in your company and subsidiaries will always be able to buy products from each other, regardless of the [Internal Sale] setting.
Customize the production technology level for this manufacturing unit.
Customize the production technology level for this manufacturning unit.
e.g. You have defined a custom image of Smart Phone with a tech level of 300.
e.g. You have defined a custom image of Smart Phone with a tech level of 300.
e.g. You have defined a custom image of Smart Phone with a tech level of 300.
e.g. You have defined a custom image of Smart Phone with a tech level of 300.
It is used for calculating the Net Imports component of GDP.
It is used for calculating the Net Exports component of GDP.
A nation's population growth is supported by 1) #a low unemployment rate#, 2) #high quality of living#, and 3) #sufficient housing supply#.
A nation's population growth is supported by a low employment rate, high quality of living, and sufficient supplies of new apartments.
The population growth rate is a result of comparing the nation's population in the beginning of this year with the same period last year.
The population growth rate is a result of comparing the city's population in the beginning of this year with the same period last year.
(#Better supplies mean products with higher overall ratings with no shortage of supply.#) The AI will NOT change the product type when it sources new supplies.
The AI will NOT change the product type when it sources new supplies.
(#Better supplies mean products with higher overall ratings with no shortage of supply.#) The AI may change the product types at will.
The AI may change the product types at will.
You cannot build new ones.
You cannot build any more new ones.
When you enable eCommerce sales for this firm, your eCommerce sites will add all consumer products from this firm to its catalog.
When you enable eCommerce sales for this firm, your eCommerce sites will add all consumer products from this firm to its catalog.

Toogle Display (Hotkey: Ctrl-A)

Personal Computer Users

The staff's #skill level# affects the #quality of service# of this bank branch.
The staff's skill level affects the quality of service of this bank branch.
You may set the #training budget# to provide training to the staff to increase their skills.
You may set the training budget to provide training to the staff to increase their skills.
If the #City Economics Simulation DLC# is enabled, it is also affected by the #education level# of people in the city.
If the City Economics Simulation DLC is enabled, it is also affected by the education level of people in the city.
A long customer waiting time negatively affects the #service quality# of the branch.
A long customer waiting time negatively affects the service quality of the branch.
The quality of service of this bank branch is primarily determined by the #staff skill level# and the #customer waiting time#.
The quality of service of this bank branch is primarily determined by the Staff Skill Level.
When the #customer waiting time# is higher than 30, it starts to negatively affect the #quality of service#.
When the Customer Waiting Time is higher than 30, it starts to negatively affect the Quality of Service.
To increase it, select the #Marketing# tab and set up advertising.
To increase it, select the "Marketing" tab and set up advertising.
The average staff skill level of all the bank's branches. It affects the overall #service quality# of the bank.
The average staff skill level of all the bank's branches.
If the #City Economics Simulation DLC# is enabled, the #skill level# is also affected by the #education level# of people.
It affects the overall service quality of the bank.
It affects the overall #service quality# of the bank.
It affects the overall service quality of the bank.
The average service quality of all the bank's branches.
The average service qualty of all the bank's branches.
It is determined by the #staff skill level# and the #customer waiting time#.
It is determined by the Staff Skill Level and the Customer Waiting Time.
To increase it, select the #Marketing# page and set up advertising.
To increase it, select the "Marketing" page and set up advertising.

Loan Credit Rating
Client Deposits
Loans are categorized based on the borrowers' credit ratings which indicate the financial health of the borrowers.
The figure shows the total client deposits and the year-over-year growth rate.
AAA is the best credit rating. C is the poorest credit rating.
The graph shows the deposits over the past 36 months.
LOANINT
DEPOSHQ
Loan Interest Rate Borrowers with good credit ratings can obtain loans with lower interest rates.
Client Deposits from All Branches of This Bank
Conversely, borrowers with poor credit ratings have the higher default risks, thus the bank charges higher interest rates to justify the risks. ~
The figure shows the total client deposits from all branches of this bank and the year-over-year growth rate.
LOANALLO New Loans Allocation
The graph shows the deposits over the past 36 months.

At the initial setting, a bank lends money evenly to borrowers of different credit ratings (20% each). When you increase the allocation to borrowers of poorer credit ratings, the bank will receive higher interest income, but the loan default rate will also increase as a result.

BANKINCO Consolidated Bank Income Statement

Stock Split
A bank has its own balance sheet and its assets are separate from the parent company's. ~
A stock split increases the total number of shares in a corporation and diminishes its stock price.
BFUNDTRA
Fund Transfer You may transfer funds from the parent company to the bank's balance sheet or vice versa.

~ INSUINCO
Consolidated Insurance Company Income Statement It consolidates the financial data from the HQ and all its front offices.
DIVIDMAX
~ INSUASSE
Maximum Special Dividend
Insurance Company Assets An insurance company has its own balance sheet and its assets are separate from the parent company's.
The maximum amount of special dividend you can pay is the smaller value of 1) the company's cash and 2) its retained earnings.
IFUNDTRA
DIVIDEAR
Fund Transfer
Retained Earnings
You may transfer funds from the parent company to the insurance company's balance sheet or vice versa. ~
The retained earnings are the accumulative net earnings of a company.
PREMRESE
Claims Reserves The claims reserves represent the money which must be held by the insurance company so as to be able to meet all future claims arising from policies written in the past.
You can view it on the Balance Sheet at the Corporate Details screen.
UWPROFIT
DIVIDPAY
Underwriting Profit
Pay a Special Dividend
The profit from underwriting insurance policies. It equals to the amount of premiums received, less insurance claims and operating expenses.
You may pay a special dividend from your company or a subsidiary with a controlling interest of at least 75%.
~ IVPROFIT
Investment Profit The profits from investments in stocks, bonds, and bank deposits.

Bank Capital Ratio
Operating Expenses Report
The #Capital Ratio# is the ratio of a bank's #Equity Capital# to its total #Loans to Customers#. A bank must maintain a capital ratio that meets the central bank's requirement.
View the operating expenses of this bank branch.
BCAPRAT2
INSUBRFI
Required Bank Capital Ratio
Operating Expenses Report
The central bank requires banks to have set aside enough capital to cover unexpected losses and keep themselves solvent in a crisis.
View the operating expenses of this insurance office.
LOANDEPP
LOANIIAN
Maximum Loans-to-Assets Ratio The maximum amount of loans that the bank can lend out is restricted by this ratio.
Projected Annual Total Loan Interest Incomes
A higher ratio increases incomes from loan interests but it also increases the bank's liquidity risks. ~
This figure is projected by multiplying the latest monthly loan interest incomes by 12 months.
INT_MARG Net Interest Margin
The same for the other 2 figures below.

The #net interest margin# is a measure of the difference between the bank's #interest income from loans# and the amount of #deposit interest paid out to its customers#, relative to the amount of its #interest-earning assets#. ~
To see the real historical total net interest incomes, please view the Financial report.
BFACEVAL Face Value
When the Inflation mode is set to #Inverse Inflation#, a bond's #Face Value# may decline over time due to inflation. ~
LOANCRED
BCOUPONR Coupon Rate
Loan Credit Rating
It tells you what the bond paid when it was issued. The amount of interest income earned on the bond each year can be calculated by multiplying the bond's Face Value by its Coupon Rate.
Loans are categorized based on the borrowers' credit ratings which indicate the financial health of the borrowers.
~ BYIELD
AAA is the best credit rating.

Yield (also called Yield to Maturity) A bond's Yield takes into account the bond's current market price and tells you what you will actually earn on an annualized basis when you buy the bond at its current market price.
C is the poorest credit rating.
RESETSRH Reset Stock Returns History
LOANINT
Loan Interest Rate
STOPBANK Stop Bank Deposits and Loans
Borrowers with good credit ratings can obtain loans with lower interest rates.
Access the interface for stopping new bank deposits and/or loans. Only do this when you intend to wind down the bank.
Conversely, borrowers with poor credit ratings have the higher default risks, thus the bank charges higher interest rates to justify the risks.
AVGINTER
LOANALLO
Average Interest Rate
New Loans Allocation
It is the average interest rate of all deposits under this term, including older time deposits that were set up at interest rates different than the current interest rate. ~
At the initial setting, a bank lends money evenly to borrowers of different credit ratings (20% each).
WTOTTECH
Total Tech The Total Tech value is calculated by adding up the values of individual tech, adjusted by their assigned weights (indicated by the yellow bars).
When you increase the allocation to borrowers of poorer credit ratings, the bank will receive higher interest income, but the loan default rate will also increase as a result.
A tech with a bigger weight means that it is more important. ~
WTOPTECH Top Tech
LOANAII
The Top Tech value represents the highest Total Tech value that is ever achieved by a company, whether it is this company or a competitor, for this type of Internet business. ~
Projected Annual Interest Incomes
WTECHQUA Tech Quality
The bank collects interest payments from loan borrowers.

Tech Quality is calculated by dividing the current Total Tech by Top Tech, then multiplied by 100. (100 x Total Tech / Top Tech.) It represents this Internet firm's relative strength in the technology.
Loan interests are the main incomes of the bank.
WREQTECH
LOANIITO
Required Tech
Projected Annual Total Loan Interest Incomes
This Internet company does not have the required technology to start operation yet, as the current Tech Quality is still lower than the Required Tech. ~
This figure is projected by multiplying the latest monthly loan interest incomes by 12 months.
CLOANDEP Current Loans-to-Assets Ratio
The same for the other 2 figures below.

The Loans-to-Assets ratio is calculated by dividing the bank's total amount of loans by its total amount of assets. When it is higher than the Maximum Loans-to-Assets Ratio, the bank will stop giving out new loans.
To see the real historical total net interest incomes, please view the Financial report.
BUSIACTI
REALGDPG
Business Activity Index
Real GDP Growth
It is an index measuring business activity in the city. When the city has a high level of business activity, more jobs will be created, lowering the unemployment rate.
Real GDP growth on an annual basis is the nominal GDP growth rate adjusted for inflation.
TAXOFFSE
REGLOBAL
Profit Tax
Global Rent Settings
The profit of this firm is offset against losses in other firms of this corporation, resulting in a reduction in its profit tax. ~
It currently uses the global rent settings from its HQ's Real Estate department.

Click to toggle it to use local settings.

RELOCAL
Click here to change the housing graph to display one of the following: supply, demand, or supply vs demand. ~
Local Rent Settings
OFFIGRAP Office Space Graph Mode
The rent is set locally.
Click here to change the office space graph to display one of the following: supply, demand, or supply vs demand.
Click to toggle it to use the global settings from its HQ's Real Estate department.
~ PARENTCR
Parent Company Credit Rating The credit rating of a subsidiary company would never exceed its parent company's credit rating.
HQ_AUTOA
~ CAPRATIO
Auto Manage Apartments
The bank's Capital Ratio is too low The bank's Capital Ratio is too low and has stopped issuing new loans.
When this is enabled, the computer will automatically manage all of the corporation's existing apartments.
To resume loan issuance, access the bank, select [Financial] and [Fund Transfer]. Then inject capital into the bank.
It will set the apartments' rents based on your preference which you may customize with the "Rent" setting below.
BCRMODE0
HQ_AUTOC
Options for Handling Insufficient Bank Capital Ratio
Auto Manage Commercial Buildings
When the Bank Capital Ratio falls below the Requirement, there are 3 possible ways to handle it. ~
When this is enabled, the computer will automatically manage all of the corporation's existing commercial buildings.
BCRMODE1
Must Take Action When the bank capital ratio is too low, the game will pop up a window forcing the player to take action.
It will set the commercial buildings' rents based on your preference which you may customize with the "Rent" setting below.
BCRMODE2
TRANCASH
Notification Only
Transferable Cash
When the bank capital ratio is too low, the game will stop issuing loans and notify you via the Event Tracker. ~
The maximum amount of cash that you are allowed to transfer from the bank to your corporation.
BCRMODE3
No Notification When the bank capital ratio is too low, the game will stop issuing loans.
On its balance sheet, the bank's net assets must be greater than the required bank capital.
It will not notify you. ~
The capital requirement set by the central bank.
ITRANCAS Transferable Cash
The maximum amount of cash that you are allowed to transfer from the insurance company to your corporation. ~
TRANMODE
ITRANMOD Transfer Mode
Transfer Mode
You may change the transfer mode - whether it is to transfer funds from the insurance company to its parent corporation, or the other way round, by clicking on the Arrow icon.
You may change the transfer mode - whether it is to transfer funds from the bank to its parent corporation, or the other way round, by clicking on the Arrow icon.
BANKROE
MARKETSH
Return on Equity Return on Equity (ROE) is calculated by dividing the bank's Net Profit by its Equity Capital.
Market Share Window
ROE is considered a measure of how effectively the bank is using its capital to generate profits. (The change from 12 months ago is displayed in brackets.)
Click here to show/hide the window that shows the Market Share of the current product.
INSUROE
DEPOSCAP
Return on Equity
Deposit
Return on Equity (ROE) is calculated by dividing the insurance company's Net Profit by its Equity Capital.
The maximum deposit amount is constrained by the deposit cap.
It is capped to a range from -50% to 50% for the purpose of calculating the average ROE. ~
Under the regulation, deposits should be not concentrated on a small number of large depositors.
SWITMODE
Switch View (hotkey: 'A') Click here to switch between the standard view and the Cumulative Performance view.
There is a cap that limits the maximum amount of deposit each depositor can make.

INT_MARG
Internal Sale
Net Interest Margin

This option specifies whether you want the AI executive to change products #Internal Sale# settings for you. When #Internal Sale# is enabled for a product, it is for internal sale only and competitors are not allowed to buy it.

Net interest margin is a measure of the difference between the bank's interest income from loans and the amount of deposit interest paid out to its customers, relative to the amount of its interest-earning assets.
~ INTSALEC
Sell factory #Internal Sale# products at cost For those products marked for #Internal Sale# in factories, the AI will always sell them at cost.

Average Interest Rate
Price Synchronization Enabled for Retail Stores Only When you set a new price, the new price will be applied to all of your #Retail Stores# selling the same product in the same city.
It is the average interest rate of all deposits under this term, including older time deposits that were set up at interest rates different than the current interest rate.
~ PRICSYN2
Price Synchronization Enabled for All Firms When you set a new price, the new price will be applied to #all of your firms# of the same type selling the same product in the same city.
WTOTTECH
~ SINCELVR
Total Tech

The number of years since the release of the last version The demand for a software product soars during the release of a new version, then decreases over time as more users have already owned the new version.
The Total Tech value is calculated by adding up the values of individual tech, adjusted by their assigned weights (indicated by the yellow bars).
Thus it is important to regularly release new versions to generate new demand. ~
A tech with a bigger weight means that it is more important.
B_NATION Sovereign Bonds

Options for Handling Insufficient Bank Capital Ratio
BRANDCOR
Corporate Brand When a corporation uses a single umbrella brand for all its products, newly launched products will benefit from the existing corporate brand.

BRANDRAN
BCRMODE1
Range Brand
Must Take Action
Under this strategy, products in the #Same Product Class# are labeled with a single range brand.
When the bank capital ratio is too low, the game will pop up a window forcing the player to take action.
BRANDUNI
BCRMODE2
Unique Brand
Notification Only
Under this strategy, each product has a unique brand. The advantage is that a product's brand will not be weighted down by quality issues from other product lines.

University Research in Products
INC_COMP How to increase a city's competitiveness
University Research in specific industries leads to #higher competitiveness#.
1)A city's competitiveness increases faster when there is a larger number of companies engaging in R&D or production activities in the industry.
1) The city's local businesses benefit from increased competitiveness and #export#, thus hiring more workers and decreasing the city's #unemployment rate#.
2)The city government sponsors a university to conduct research in a specific industry. ~
2) #Manufacturing units# in factories have #City Quality Bonuses# added to their products' #Product Quality# ratings.
T_ROAD Open the Road Editor (hotkey: Ctrl-R)
UR_TECH
UNIVSUSP No Active Research
University Research in Tech
The operation of this University is currently suspended. To enable research, please set the #Operation slider# of this university to a value larger than zero.
University Research in specific fields of technology leads to increases in #skill levels# of researchers and software engineers in those fields (under the Talent system).

Management Policies

GDP_EFF1
RENAMESU
Effects of GDP (part 1)
Rename Subsidiary

The following #GDP components# contribute to the GDP growth and make a huge impact on the economy, leading to booms and #busts in the economic cycle#, affecting #inflation#, #employment rates#, #wage rates#, and #interest rates#.
Rename this subsidiary company.
GDP_EFF2
MERGECOM
Effects of GDP (part 2)
Merge Company

For example, when your company embarks on a large-scale business expansion in a city, it increases the #Investment component# of GDP, which in turn contributes to the #GDP growth# and kicks the economy into the high gear.
Merge this company into your company.
The newly established companies #create jobs# for the city, lowering the #unemployment rate#. Subsequently the #tightening labor market# will force companies to #raise salaries of their employees#.
(Your company is the majority shareholder of this company.)
GDP_EFF3
MERGECO2
Effects of GDP (part 3)
Merge Company
Further along in this chain of effects, #a higher wage rate# leads to #increased consumer spending#, setting the stage for #inflation to rise#.
Merge this company into your subsidiary company.

When rising inflation is unchecked and eventually runs rampant, the central bank will have no choice but to put a break on it by #hiking the interest rate# aggressively, which will inevitably #drag the economy into recession#.
(Your subsidiary company is the majority shareholder of this company.)
~ GDP_CONS
Consumption Consumption is the total value of goods and services that are bought by the population simulated in the game.

GDP_NETE
UNSELALL
Net Exports Net Exports equal to #exports# minus #imports#.
Unselect All
#Imports# occur when companies in the game purchase products from suppliers in a different city. #Exports# occur when companies sell products to business clients in another city.
Unselect all firms in the current list.
ECOSTATE
LOCSTOCK
Economic State This indicates the present state of the city's economy.
Local Stock Market
When the economy is booming, there will be strong demand for consumer goods. Conversely, during a recession, consumers reduce their spending, especially for non-essential goods.
GDP_GROW GDP Growth Rate
GLOSTOCK
The GDP growth rate indicates how fast the economy is growing. A negative growth rate means that the economy is shrinking.
Global Stock Market
CBANKATT
Central Bank Attitude
DISCORD
This shows the central bank's attitude toward inflation. Inflation Dove means that the central bank is willing to let inflation run higher before raising the interest rate.
Join the Discord channel of Capitalism Lab.
CBANKPOL
Central Bank Policy
FACEBOOK

This indicates whether the central bank currently maintains a loose monetary policy with increased money supply and a low interest rate, or a tight monetary policy with reduced money supply and a high interest rate.
Open the official Capitalism Lab Facebook page.
MONEYSD
Money Supply and Demand This indicates the current levels of money supply and demand.
FORUM
When the central bank maintains a loose monetary policy, there will be an increase to the money supply and the interest rate will fall. ~
